name: Electroaeroelastic Generator Wing
short_description: Numerical model for simulating an electroaeroelastic airfoil-based energy harvesting system. This project can predict the aeroelastic behavior of a symmetrical airfoil with and without a control surface. In addition, it predicts the voltage output due to piezoelectric coupling to one of the structural degrees of freedom. It represents both linear and nonlinear (structural) behaviors. The Jones approximation to the Wagner's indicial function is used to determine the unsteady aerodynamic loading. A state-space representation of the equations of motion is solved by a 4th order Runge-Kutta scheme.
summary: Simulation tool for an electroaeroelastic generator wing
